Package org.moddingx.libx.datagen.provider.patchouli.page

Interface PageBuilder

public interface PageBuilder
An interface that defines methods, instances of Content can use to build book pages.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    addAnchor(String name)
    Adds a new floating anchor.
    void
    addPage(JsonObject page)
    Adds a new page from the given json data.
    void
    checkAssets(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation path)
    Checks that a given asset exists, Throws an exception if not.
    void
    flipToEven()
    Inserts an empty page, if necessary, so the next added page will have an even page number.
    boolean
    isFirst()
    Gets whether the next added page will be the first page of an entry.
    String
    translate(String localized)
    Gets a string that should be used in the book for the given text.

  • Method Details

    • isFirst

      boolean isFirst()
      Gets whether the next added page will be the first page of an entry.

    • addPage

      void addPage(JsonObject page)
      Adds a new page from the given json data.

    • addAnchor

      void addAnchor(String name)
      Adds a new floating anchor. A floating anchor is added to the next page that is added via addPage(JsonObject). There may only ever be one floating anchor at a time and the next page after a floating anchor may not add an anchor itself.

    • translate

      String translate(String localized)
      Gets a string that should be used in the book for the given text. Depending on the properties, this will either register a translation and return the translation key or will return the text itself.

    • flipToEven

      void flipToEven()
      Inserts an empty page, if necessary, so the next added page will have an even page number.

    • checkAssets

      void checkAssets(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation path)
      Checks that a given asset exists, Throws an exception if not.
